name: The Heart Specialist Clinic Pte Ltd

reviews.text: In Singapore for 7 years as expats and definitively the best doctor and experience I have had with medical staff in Singapore. Dr Lim is friendly and does not overcharge like most of other doctors do. No waiting and efficient process should you need x rays or the like. Highly recommended.

For a cardiologist who is detail-oriented and possesses good bedside manners, consider Dr. Lim Tiong Keng. He is meticulous attention to detail, which is crucial for accurate diagnoses and treatment plans. Dr. Lim Tiong Keng is also recognized for his compassionate approach, ensuring that patients feel comfortable and understood during consultations.

Dr. Paul is an exceptional and kind-hearted doctor. Although he cannot speak Bahasa, he still tried to explain to my parents, he typed all the words in Google Translate so my parents can understand all his explanations, which is very clear and easy to understand. He also did follow-ups on us, checking the updates from us. Giving advices and opinions. Never seen a doctor like him in my life. Thank you so much, Dr. Paul.

Dr Paul Lim has been fantastic in treating my wife following her heart surgery. 2 months after surgery she started suffering dizziness episodes. Dr Paul was patient and thorough, listening carefully and fully explaining his assessments and proposed courses of action. Really positive experience. I would highly recommend Dr Paul.
Doc Lim is very professional and helpful, he is very patient to explain all the reports and gave me very good suggestion. I am grateful he is my doctor.
